Your access to rich, ecologically clean, sustainably harvested, organic Natural Siberian Resources

About Us

SiberHealth works with supplemental and whole food companies throughout the Pacific Northwest to provide business consulting and support that is unique and culturally adaptable, profitable to their clients and flexible to their client’s business needs.

Our Approach

Collaboration

Our company’s approach to the science of collaboration is to bring you business results that fit your company’s needs accurately, rapidly and with less energy spent by all parties. Our competitive advantage is in effective method of applying our vast professional experience in the field of whole health and business as well as cultural awareness applied during process of collaboration between our partners.

Solutions

There is a common goal that we will work toward jointly, which is financial success of our companies through distribution of products that deliver health to consumers. We use a clever approach of applying our well-designed system of communication that thoroughly corresponds with goals of your company, first of all, and available solutions on our end to achieve homogeneously beneficial results as business partners. We combine our ideas together to help your company to achieve its objectives.

Flexibility

Decisions are all yours with us. Either you get to choose a product from the list of available products, readymade for specific health goals by our scientists, or you can request a special solution to fit your company’s needs. We help you with placing an order, communications, and travels, if you choose to visit our partners. You decide on the volume of products and branding, labels and containers. Our partners only advise you on possible issues and make you a commercial offer with the necessary calculations.

Services

Communication

Collaboration

Advising

We guarantee your company quick product launch since all substances involved in the making of your product have already been registered with appropriate entities. You get to independently determine pricing for your selling goods.

The quality of ingredients and safety management systems of our partners are certified in accordance with ISO 22000 and GMP standards.

You get to independently select product names and packaging design or you can have our

partners to take care of that for you at additional minimal cost. You are not required to order in large quantities as your first batch.

Once you’ve received the product all is left is for you to make a profit!

Partners

Product development

The pharmaceutical company Artlife, LLC is a high-tech and innovative enterprise in the center of Siberia. It is a manufacturer of dietary supplements, food products, and cosmetics. The technological capabilities of the company Artlife, LLC allows us to develop completely new types of products, in any form of packaging, and solely depending on your preferences. Our company takes great pride in providing our partner with such services as product formulation development, purchase of raw materials and prototyping. We also are responsible for product registration and protection of your intellectual property when it is part of our contractual agreement.

Production

Sibfarmkontrakt, LLC is a subsidiary company of Artlife, LLC that carries out a full cycle of production on a contractual basis with other private label companies around the world. More than 120 companies, including companies in China, South Korea, Japan, Germany, and United States have become their regular customers due to appreciation of the quality of their products and capabilities of this company to supply on-demand. Use of modern technological capabilities, use of natural, organic, and high-quality components, and constant improvement of the compound recipes in an enterprise with more than twenty years of experience, allowed them to create a series of products that produce a positive biological effect at the cellular level of human bodies.

Raw materials

SiBex’s patented technology involves the extraction of the “live elements” of trees in a way that both preserves and amplifies their biological activity. This process can be applied to any tree or plant biomass and it can be tuned to obtain specific fractions or combinations of the underlying biologically active compounds. This enables SibEx to have new Bioeffectives® developed in treating a particular disease or combating a specific group of pathogenic micro-organisms. The 17 Bioeffectives® in Solagran’s portfolio have all been derived from the application of its technology to northern hemisphere conifer species. These trees represent a particularly rich source.
